title: How Saudi Arabia’s Blowup With Biden Threatens Democrats in 2022
description: Democrats and administration officials are furious at the Saudis’ move to cut oil production, seeing it as an attempt to meddle in a U.S. election.
dc:creator: Blake Hounshell
media:credit: Bandar Aljaloud/Saudi Royal Palace, via Associated Press
media:description: In this image released by the Saudi Royal Palace, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman greeted President Biden in July in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
